event.title: Create New Event
event.subtitle: Configure your racing event for the Beswib platform

eventInformation.title: Event Information
eventInformation.description: Basic information about the event including name, date, and location.

eventDetails.title: Event Details
eventDetails.description: Additional details about distance, elevation, pricing, and logistics.

bibPickup.title: Bib Pickup Information
bibPickup.description: Details about where and when participants can collect their bibs.

partnership.title: Partnership Settings
partnership.description: Configure partnership status and related settings.

organizer.title: Event Organizer
organizer.description: Select the organizer responsible for this event.

eventOptions.title: Event Options
eventOptions.description: Configure additional options and categories for the event.

logoUpload.label: Event Logo
logoUpload.description: Upload a logo for your event. Supported formats: PNG, JPG, SVG (max 5MB)
logoUpload.uploadSubtext: Drag or drop your files here or click to upload

isPartnered.label: Partner Event
isPartnered.description: Is this event partnered with Beswib?

success.title: Event Created Successfully!
success.message: "{eventName}" has been created and is now available on the platform.

errors.creationFailed: Failed to create event. Please try again.
errors.fillRequired: Please fill in all required fields.

event.title: Créer un Nouvel Événement
event.subtitle: Configurez votre événement de course pour la plateforme Beswib

eventInformation.title: Informations de l'Événement
eventInformation.description: Informations de base sur l'événement incluant le nom, la date et le lieu.

eventDetails.title: Détails de l'Événement
eventDetails.description: Détails supplémentaires sur la distance, le dénivelé, les prix et la logistique.

bibPickup.title: Informations de Retrait des Dossards
bibPickup.description: Détails sur où et quand les participants peuvent récupérer leurs dossards.

partnership.title: Paramètres de Partenariat
partnership.description: Configurez le statut de partenariat et les paramètres associés.

organizer.title: Organisateur de l'Événement
organizer.description: Sélectionnez l'organisateur responsable de cet événement.

eventOptions.title: Options de l'Événement
eventOptions.description: Configurez les options supplémentaires et les catégories pour l'événement.

logoUpload.label: Logo de l'Événement
logoUpload.description: Téléchargez un logo pour votre événement. Formats supportés : PNG, JPG, SVG (max 5Mo)
logoUpload.uploadSubtext: Glissez et déposez vos fichiers ici ou cliquez pour télécharger

bibPickupLocation.label: Lieu de Retrait des Dossards
bibPickupLocation.placeholder: Salon du Marathon, Porte de Versailles

bibPickupBegin.label: Début de la Période de Retrait

bibPickupEnd.label: Fin de la Période de Retrait

isPartnered.label: Événement Partenaire
isPartnered.description: Cet événement est-il en partenariat avec Beswib ?

partnership.partnered: Événement Partenaire (permet la revente de dossards)

success.title: Événement Créé avec Succès !
success.message: "{eventName}" a été créé et est maintenant disponible sur la plateforme.
success.redirecting: Redirection vers le tableau de bord admin...

errors.creationFailed: Échec de la création de l'événement. Veuillez réessayer.
errors.fillRequired: Veuillez remplir tous les champs obligatoires.

event.title: 새 이벤트 생성
event.subtitle: Beswib 플랫폼을 위한 레이싱 이벤트를 구성하세요

eventInformation.title: 이벤트 정보
eventInformation.description: 이름, 날짜, 위치를 포함한 이벤트의 기본 정보입니다.

eventDetails.title: 이벤트 세부사항
eventDetails.description: 거리, 고도, 가격 및 물류에 대한 추가 세부사항입니다.

bibPickup.title: 비브 픽업 정보
bibPickup.description: 참가자들이 비브를 수령할 수 있는 장소와 시간에 대한 세부사항입니다.

partnership.title: 파트너십 설정
partnership.description: 파트너십 상태 및 관련 설정을 구성합니다.

eventOptions.title: 이벤트 옵션
eventOptions.description: 이벤트를 위한 추가 옵션과 카테고리를 구성합니다.

logoUpload.label: 이벤트 로고
logoUpload.description: 이벤트 로고를 업로드하세요. 지원 형식: PNG, JPG, SVG (최대 5MB)
logoUpload.uploadSubtext: 파일을 여기에 드래그 앤 드롭하거나 클릭하여 업로드하세요

isPartnered.label: 파트너 이벤트
isPartnered.description: 이 이벤트가 Beswib과 파트너십을 맺고 있나요?
